title: Poro Snax Emote
body: I got the Poro Snax Emote from Snowdown 2016. I equipped it today, but somehow i can't trigger it.

replies.body:
Some icons, like some of the poro ones, have animations but only during a specific event.  In this case, the animations disabled once snowdown was over.  I don't have any details on it making a come back, but I certainly hope it does!  Be sure to bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page should that occur.  

I believe in a world where all poro snax are delicious without having it's presentation questioned.  {{item:2054}}   Cheers!
